post_title: FS - (3rd and last price reduction) 3 Remaining T206 Graded Tolstoi's
post_content:
For Sale 4 very nice SGC graded Tolstoi's.   All prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  NC residents add 6.5% ST.

T206 Ed Willets - Tolstoi (With wet sheet transfer) - SGC 4 SOLD
T206 John Hummel - Tolstoi (Slight wet sheet transfer) - SGC 4 $625 pp ff
T206 Tim Jordan Batting - Tolstoi - SGC 3 $525 pp ff
T206 Admiral Schlei Batting - Tolstoi - SGC $525 pp ff

Or take the remaining three for $1525 pp ff.

Bob I.
Bump for 2nd reduction, new pricing on remaining 3 and discount for the lot.
